comment: Bhai bahut kuch seekhna mila terese..Starting se abhi tak shayad tu ne max 15 days bhi chutti nahi liya hoga..Tere work ethics ke bare me abhi bhi mere juniors/friends ko boltha hu..Har cheez me tere growth dheke bahut achha lagtha hai ..aage tere liye, bahut achi life hai, vo mei dekh rahu abhi âœ¨

comment: Mehoni bhai from GJ 05, it's like a ritual for us - every time we meet, it starts with 'Su che laa.' and the reply's always 'Shonti' ğŸ˜„.  baki khao pio, moj maja kro km k moj ni koi khoj na hoy. be yourself and wear that grin proudly. aap jivan ma haranfal prgati kro evi apne khub khub shubhechhao!!
